data.caption: Appointment
data.news_body: ABM International Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of Mr DEEP KUMAR SHARMA as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. January 10, 2026.

data.caption: Cessation
data.news_body: ABM International Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Cessation of Mr VISHWANATHA MAHALINGAM as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. January 06, 2026.

data.caption: Price movement
data.news_body: Significant movement in price has been observed in ABM International Limited. The Exchange, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market place so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded, had written to the company. ABM International Limited has submitted their response.

data.caption: Price movement
data.news_body: Significant movement in price has been observed in ABM International Limited. data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: ABM International Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Proceedings of Annual General Meeting held on September 30, 2025. Further, the company has submitted the Exchange a copy of Srutinizers report along with copy of minutes.

data.caption: Appointment
data.news_body: ABM International Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the appointment of M/s. Mohit Mehta and Associates, Company Secretaries as Secretarial Auditor of the Company, for a period 5 (five) consecutive years from FY 2025-26 to 2029-30.
